original_solution_mapping.L1: First find the total distance to the beach: 16 blocks * 1/8 mile/block = <<16*1/8=2>>2 miles
original_solution_mapping.L2: Then find how long in hours Jack has to get to the beach: 10 minutes / 60 minutes/hour = 1/6 hour
original_solution_mapping.L3: Then divide the distance Jack needs to cover by the time in hours he has to find how fast he needs to jog: 2 miles / 1/6 hour = 12 miles/hour

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4485.
    Returns: the speed Jack needs to jog in miles per hour.
    """
    # L1
    num_blocks = 16 # 16 blocks away
    miles_per_block = Fraction(1, 8) # each block is 1/8th of a mile
    total_distance_miles = num_blocks * miles_per_block

    # L2
    time_minutes = 10 # melt in 10 minutes
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    time_hours = Fraction(time_minutes, minutes_per_hour)

    # L3
    required_speed_mph = total_distance_miles / time_hours

    # FA
    answer = required_speed_mph
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: First find the total distance to the beach: {num_blocks} blocks * {miles_per_block} mile/block = <<{num_blocks}*{miles_per_block}={total_distance_miles}>>{total_distance_miles} miles
Then find how long in hours Jack has to get to the beach: {time_minutes} minutes / {minutes_per_hour} minutes/hour = {time_hours} hour
Then divide the distance Jack needs to cover by the time in hours he has to find how fast he needs to jog: {total_distance_miles} miles / {time_hours} hour = {required_speed_mph} miles/hour

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Then find how long in hours Jack has to get to the beach: 10 minutes / 60 minutes/hour = 10/60 hour
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Then divide the distance Jack needs to cover by the time in hours he has to find how fast he needs to jog: 2 miles / 10/60 hour = 1/3 miles/hour
